attributes.additional_details:
We pray this Governement to be blessed and turn back to God, may we again have a National day of prayer and repentance and turn and see our Nation healed.

It was good enough for Churchill and King George VI they called to Almighty God for help and many of our troops were saved. We can do it too - if we do it now there is still hope!

Please God cause this petition to bring light into our Government in Jesus Name
